nodes.id: 中国人民解放军火箭军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区清河街道

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的第四军种，由中央军事委员会直接领导指挥，以地对地常规及战略导弹为主要装备，担负常规导弹目标打击和核打击及核子反击导弹战略作战等任务。其前身为中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队。
description.en: The fourth branch of the People's Liberation Army, directly commanded by the Central Military Commission. It is equipped with conventional and strategic surface-to-surface missiles and is responsible for conventional missile strikes, nuclear strikes, and strategic nuclear counterattack missions. Its predecessor was the PLA Second Artillery Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队
en: People's Liberation Army Second Artillery Corps

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的战略性独立兵种，是火箭军的前身。由周恩来命名，主要负责核威慑和常规导弹作战任务。
description.en: A former strategic independent branch of the People's Liberation Army and the predecessor of the Rocket Force. Named by Zhou Enlai, it was primarily responsible for nuclear deterrence and conventional missile operations.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关，统一领导全国武装力量。
description.en: The highest national military leading body of the People's Republic of China, which commands the nation's armed forces.

en: Deepening national defense and military reform

description.zh-cn: 由习近平领导的旨在全面改革中国人民解放军的军事改革运动，其中包括调整领导指挥体制、优化规模结构和力量编成等。
description.en: A military reform campaign led by Xi Jinping aimed at comprehensively reforming the People's Liberation Army, including adjusting the leadership and command system, and optimizing its size, structure, and force composition.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国空气动力学家，被誉为“中国导弹之父”。1956年建议中央军委组建专门的导弹部队，并提出了“火箭军”的名称。
description.en: Chinese aerodynamicist, known as the 'Father of Chinese Missiles'. In 1956, he suggested the Central Military Commission form a dedicated missile force and proposed the name 'Rocket Army'.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。他将新成立的导弹部队命名为“第二炮兵”。
description.en: Chinese proletarian revolutionary, politician, military strategist, and diplomat, who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China. He named the newly established missile force the 'Second Artillery'.

en: Strategic Rocket Forces of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联武装力量的一个军种，是苏联核三位一体战略力量的主要组成部分。中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队升格为火箭军参考了其经验。
description.en: A branch of the Soviet Armed Forces that was the main component of the USSR's nuclear triad. The experience of this force was referenced when China's Second Artillery Corps was upgraded to the Rocket Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、战略家、理论家和诗人，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。他在1956年作出研制导弹、原子弹，创建中国战略核力量的决策。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, strategist, theorist, and poet, the main founder and first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. In 1956, he made the decision to develop missiles and atomic bombs and to create China's strategic nuclear forces.

description.zh-cn: 指中国拥有的用于执行战略核威慑和核反击任务的武装力量，主要由火箭军构成。
description.en: Refers to China's armed forces for strategic nuclear deterrence and counter-attack missions, mainly composed of the Rocket Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 指2023年期间被曝光的涉及中国人民解放军火箭军高级将领的系列腐败及泄密调查事件，导致包括司令员李玉超在内的多名将领被免职或调查。
description.en: Refers to a series of corruption and intelligence leak investigations involving senior generals of the PLA Rocket Force that were exposed in 2023, leading to the removal or investigation of several generals, including Commander Li Yuchao.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军上将，曾任火箭军司令员，后因涉嫌腐败和泄密被调查。
description.en: A general of the PLA Rocket Force who served as its commander and was later investigated for suspected corruption and leaking secrets.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军中将，曾任火箭军副司令员，后因涉嫌腐败和泄密被调查。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA Rocket Force who served as its deputy commander and was later investigated for suspected corruption and leaking secrets.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任火箭军副司令员、中央军委联合参谋部副参谋长，后因涉嫌腐败和泄密被调查。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA who served as Deputy Commander of the Rocket Force and Deputy Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission, and was later investigated for suspected corruption and leaking secrets.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的纪律检查机关，负责维护军队党纪、军纪，查处违纪案件。
description.en: The discipline inspection body of the Central Military Commission, responsible for upholding party and military discipline and investigating violations.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会审计署

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会审计署

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的审计监督机构，负责对军队及武警部队的经济活动进行审计监督。
description.en: The audit and supervision body of the Central Military Commission, responsible for auditing the economic activities of the military and armed police forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军上将，2023年7月接替李玉超担任火箭军司令员。
description.en: A general of the PLA Rocket Force who succeeded Li Yuchao as commander in July 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军上将，2023年7月接替徐忠波担任火箭军政治委员。
description.en: A general of the PLA Rocket Force who succeeded Xu Zhongbo as political commissar in July 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任第二炮兵部队末任司令员及火箭军首任司令员。
description.en: A general of the PLA who served as the last commander of the Second Artillery Corps and the first commander of the Rocket Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任火箭军司令员。
description.en: A general of the PLA who served as commander of the Rocket Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任第二炮兵部队末任政治委员及火箭军首任政治委员。
description.en: A general of the PLA who served as the last political commissar of the Second Artillery Corps and the first political commissar of the Rocket Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军上将，曾任火箭军政治委员。
description.en: A general of the PLA Rocket Force who served as its political commissar.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军火箭军
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军由中央军事委员会直接领导指挥。
description.en: The PLA Rocket Force is directly led and commanded by the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队是直属中共中央军委掌控的战略部队。
description.en: The PLA Second Artillery Corps was a strategic force directly controlled by the Central Military Commission of the CCP.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 作为深化国防和军队改革的措施之一，第二炮兵部队改名为中国人民解放军火箭军，并由兵种升格为军种。
description.en: As one of the measures for deepening national defense and military reform, the Second Artillery Corps was renamed the PLA Rocket Force and upgraded from a branch to a service.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军由中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队改名并升格而来，是其直接前身。
description.en: The PLA Rocket Force was renamed and upgraded from the PLA Second Artillery Corps, which is its direct predecessor.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 在火箭军成立大会上，时任中央军委主席习近平向火箭军授予军旗并致训词。
description.en: At the founding ceremony of the Rocket Force, then-Chairman of the Central Military Commission Xi Jinping presented the flag and delivered instructions to the Rocket Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 钱学森于1956年建议中央军委组建一支专门的导弹部队，并提出了“火箭军”的名称。
description.en: In 1956, Qian Xuesen suggested to the Central Military Commission the formation of a dedicated missile force and proposed the name 'Rocket Army'.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队

description.zh-cn: 国务院总理周恩来将新成立的导弹部队命名为“第二炮兵”。
description.en: Premier Zhou Enlai named the newly established missile force the 'Second Artillery'.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队升格为火箭军参考了苏联战略火箭军的经验。
description.en: The upgrade of the PLA Second Artillery Corps to the Rocket Force was influenced by the experience of the Soviet Strategic Rocket Forces.

relationships.target: 中国战略核力量

description.zh-cn: 1956年，毛泽东领导的中共中央和中央军委作出“研制导弹、原子弹，创建中国战略核力量、打破核垄断”的决策。
description.en: In 1956, the CCP Central Committee and the Central Military Commission, led by Mao Zedong, decided to 'develop missiles and atomic bombs, create China's strategic nuclear forces, and break the nuclear monopoly'.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队

description.zh-cn: 1990年2月13日，江泽民为第二炮兵部队题词：“加强战略导弹部队建设，保卫祖国安全，维护世界和平。”
description.en: On February 13, 1990, Jiang Zemin wrote an inscription for the Second Artillery Corps: 'Strengthen the construction of the strategic missile force, defend the security of the motherland, and maintain world peace.'

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛评价第二炮兵部队是“党中央、中央军委直接使用的战略部队，是我国战略威慑的核心力量”。
description.en: Hu Jintao described the Second Artillery Corps as 'a strategic force directly used by the Party Central Committee and the Central Military Commission, and the core force of our country's strategic deterrence'.

relationships.source: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 李玉超

description.zh-cn: 时任火箭军司令员李玉超被中央军委纪委调查人员带走进行调查。
description.en: Then-commander of the Rocket Force Li Yuchao was taken away for investigation by personnel from the CMC Discipline Inspection Commission.

relationships.source: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 刘光斌

description.zh-cn: 时任火箭军副司令员刘光斌被中央军委纪委调查人员带走进行调查。
description.en: Then-deputy commander of the Rocket Force Liu Guangbin was taken away for investigation by personnel from the CMC Discipline Inspection Commission.

relationships.source: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 张振中

description.zh-cn: 前火箭军副司令员张振中被中央军委纪委调查人员带走进行调查。
description.en: Former deputy commander of the Rocket Force Zhang Zhenzhong was taken away for investigation by personnel from the CMC Discipline Inspection Commission.

relationships.target: 李玉超

description.zh-cn: 李玉超因涉及2023年中国火箭军腐败案而被调查并免去司令员职务。
description.en: Li Yuchao was investigated and removed from his position as commander due to his involvement in the 2023 PLA Rocket Force corruption case.

relationships.target: 王厚斌

description.zh-cn: 因原司令员李玉超在腐败案中落马，王厚斌被任命为新任火箭军司令员。
description.en: Following the downfall of former commander Li Yuchao in the corruption case, Wang Houbin was appointed as the new commander of the Rocket Force.

relationships.target: 徐西盛

description.zh-cn: 因火箭军高层在腐败案中被清洗，徐西盛被任命为新任火箭军政治委员。
description.en: Following the purge of the Rocket Force's high command in the corruption case, Xu Xisheng was appointed as the new political commissar of the Rocket Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队
